title: Ping Issues since the recent patch in 6.15 (When the new project skins came out)
body:
So I'm kind of curious if anyone else has experienced some weird ping problem such as in my case, ping starting at 200 then gradually falling down to 50, then jumping back up to 200 ping and it just repeating. 

I'm 90% it's not my internet due to other games and downloads working fine, I've restarted the modem, re-installed league and ever since the patch where the new project skins (Ekko, Katarina and Ashe) came out is when the ping started being weird. 

Anyone else experiencing this weird issue?

replies.body:
While it may not be your network, your connection with LoL servers is seemingly unstable.

[Troubleshoot your ping spikes.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj

Hey there,

Could you please do the following for me if the fixes Rineyy posted didnt help;

* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/).
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this) and the url to your ICSI netalyzr results.
